Name: Citation
Description: The citation for the ResourcePackage. DDI strongly recommends that at minimum a Title be provided.

Name: TypeOfResourcePackage
Description: A brief description of the resource package type. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: Abstract
Description: An abstract of the ResourcePackage unit describing the nature and scope of the data collection, special characteristics of its content. Note that detailed information on the purpose of the ResourcePackage and structured coverage information are to be entered in Purpose and Coverage. Abstract supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: AuthorizationSource
Description: Identifies the authorizing agency for the ResourcePackage and allows for the full text of the authorization (law, regulation, or other form of authorization). May be used to list authorizations from oversight committees and other regulatory agencies.

Name: UniverseReference
Description: Reference to the universe statement from the universe scheme, describing the ResourcePackage of persons or other elements that are the object of research and to which any analytic results refer. Age, nationality, and residence commonly help to delineate a given universe, but any of a number of factors may be involved, such as sex, race, income, veteran status, criminal convictions, etc. The universe may consist of elements other than persons, such as housing units, court cases, deaths, countries, etc. In general, it should be possible to tell from the description of the universe whether a given individual or element (hypothetical or real) is a member of the population under ResourcePackage. A universe may be described as "inclusive" or "exclusive". This ResourcePackage level reference is normally to the top level of the UniverseScheme.

Name: SeriesStatement
Description: A ResourcePackage, particularly one in a series, may be the result of two series merging into a single ResourcePackage. The new ResourcePackage belongs to both series. For example, Niger now fields the UNICEF Multiple Indicators Cluster Survey (MICS) and the Demographic and Health Survey as a single merged instrument.

Name: QualityStatementReference
Description: A reference to a QualityStatementScheme containing statements of quality related to the quality of the ResourcePackage methodology, metadata, or data. Quality statements may be related to external quality standards.

Name: FundingInformation
Description: Contains details of the ResourcePackage unit's funding, including information about grants, agencies, etc.

Name: ProjectBudget
Description: This describes the overall budget of the ResourcePackage. It can be repeated for distinct budget activities. It contains a structured description and one or more budget documents described by an OtherMaterial type.

Name: Purpose
Description: The purpose of the ResourcePackage, why the ResourcePackage took place. This should include detailed information on the investigator's primary ResourcePackage questions or hypotheses as well as information on any legal basis for the data collection, such as laws requiring the collection of census data for apportionment purposes. Legal or other authorization should be provided in detail within AuthorizationSource. Purpose supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: Coverage
Description: Describes the coverage of the ResourcePackage unit. Detailed information on Topical, Temporal, and Spatial Coverage is contained here. Note that Coverage at this level should be inclusive all lower level modules or section. Lower level descriptions serve to constrain coverage within the scope described here.

Name: OtherMaterial
Description: Contains references to other materials relevant to the ResourcePackage unit, whether in DDI form or external. Links can be made from items in this section to any identifiable element in the instance. Best practice is to include OtherMaterial inside the maintainable containing the objects that are related to the OtherMaterial.

Name: Embargo
Description: Embargo information about the ResourcePackage unit. References to embargo information in this section can be made from individual variables.

Name: ResourcePackageArchive
Description: This is archive information specific to the creation, maintenance, and archiving of the ResourcePackage provided either in-line or by reference. This packaging element differentiates this "Archive" from one being published as a product within a ResourcePackage.

Name: ConceptualComponentReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an ConceptualComponent.

Name: DataCollectionReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an DataCollection.

Name: LogicalProductReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of any LogicalProduct. l:BaseLogicalProduct is a substitution group base.

Name: PhysicalDataProductReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an PhysicalDataProduct.

Name: PhysicalInstanceReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an PhysicalInstance.

Name: ArchiveReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an Archive.

Name: DDIProfileReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an DDIProfile.

Name: ComparisonReference
Description: Allows for in-line entry of an Comparison.

Name: OrganizationSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a OrganizationScheme.

Name: ConceptSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ConceptScheme.

Name: UniverseSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a UniverseScheme.

Name: ConceptualVariableSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ConceptualVariableScheme.

Name: RepresentedVariableSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a RepresentedVariableScheme.

Name: GeographicStructureSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a GeographicStructureScheme.

Name: GeographicLocationSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a GeographicLocationScheme.

Name: InterviewerInstructionSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a InterviewerInstructionScheme.

Name: ControlConstructSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ControlConstructScheme.

Name: QuestionSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a QuestionScheme.

Name: CategorySchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a CategoryScheme.

Name: CodeListSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a CodeListScheme.

Name: NCubeSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a NCubeScheme.

Name: VariableSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a VariableScheme.

Name: PhysicalStructureSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a PhysicalStructureScheme.

Name: RecordLayoutSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a RecordLayoutScheme.

Name: QualityStatementSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a QualityStatementScheme.

Name: InstrumentSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a InstrumentScheme.

Name: ProcessingEventSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ProcessingEventScheme.

Name: ProcessingInstructionSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ProcessingInstructionScheme.

Name: ManagedRepresentationSchemeReference
Description: In-line inclusion of a ManagedRepresentationScheme.
